author: matildaclerke

author: gtrintinalia
content: I like the idea of enabling eth/69 in the fusaka interop devnets

author: .fjl
content: So one problem is, we can't really test sync against mainnet until a significant number of users have upgraded to a node version that supports it. Geth has eth/69 on master branch, so it will also have it in the devnet. If it's easy for you, maybe merge it to your devnet branch, then we will see if it has issues during the interop event.

author: gtrintinalia
content: eth/69 is merged already but disabled by default, so we can enable it for the next devnets
